scripts.build: rollup --config rollup.config.js && npm run clean && npm run cjs && npm run min
scripts.clean: cat index.js | sed 's/(exports)/()/' | sed 's/({})/()/' | sed 's/exports.default = augmentor;//' | sed 's/exports\./augmentor./g' | sed 's/return exports;/return augmentor;/' > index.clean && mv index.clean index.js
